page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content:
Tourist attractions include: Dartington Hall and Gardens Dartington Cider Press Centre The Cott Inn, Dartington River Dart and walks Totnes-an ancient town with a castle and many craft shops The beautiful countryside
I think tourists go to Dartington Hall and the gardens to see the old buildings and the beautiful trees and bushes. The best part of the year is the summer when people picnic there. The Dartington Cider Press Centre used to be a cider press. Now there are lots of shop including a large craft shop, Tridias(toyshop), Dartington Glass, Global Village selling ethnic crafts, a farm food shop, Cranks Wholefood Restaurant and many others. Nearby is the Dartington Tweed Mill.
